testcase.name: 99.11-TestCase-hypercube-implied
testcase.description: Rule of thumb: Hypercubes should be explicitly provided. This report model and report is XBRL valid but the hypercube is not explicitly provided and therefore extracting information using hypercube is impossible.

variation.name: hypercube-implied
variation.description: Rule of thumb: Hypercubes should be explicitly provided. This report model and report is XBRL valid but the hypercube is not explicitly provided and therefore extracting information using hypercube is impossible.
